question: Hello AI model, I'm not a local from Shanghai, and I want to work in Shanghai. My work content includes: developing APPs and data mining. My boss requires me to provide a resume. This resume must be very detailed, must first write a self-introduction unrelated to work, then write work experience in APP development, and finally write work experience in data mining, ending with my passion for work. Since my boss speaks pidgin English, my resume must have a foreign tone. Therefore, the ratio of Chinese to English in my resume is 1:9, with a total word count controlled at around 600 words (must strictly generate content according to this word count, word count calculation method is Chinese character count + English word count). My boss likes witty people, so the resume needs more emojis. Due to privacy reasons, I won't give you my resume for this task, just improvise and let me see your level. The resume doesn't need special formatting, just write it plainly without paragraphs, and don't output any additional content. Also, the character '的' cannot be used more than 10 times. For better output readability, please don't output any content other than the resume. Emphasize again! Please do not output any content other than the resume!
